SEARCH
Package quadratic

Class Quadratic

java.lang.Object
quadratic.Quadratic
public class Quadratic extends Object
Represents a quadratic equation of the form ax^2 + bx + c = 0.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Quadratic()
    Default constructor initializes coefficients to 0.
    Quadratic(double a, double b, double c)
    Parameterized constructor initializes coefficients to given values.

  • Constructor Details

    • Quadratic

      public Quadratic()
      Default constructor initializes coefficients to 0.

    • Quadratic

      public Quadratic(double a, double b, double c)
      Parameterized constructor initializes coefficients to given values.
      Parameters:
      a - Coefficient of x^2.
      b - Coefficient of x.
      c - Constant term.

    • computeDiscriminant

      public double computeDiscriminant()
      Computes the discriminant of the quadratic equation.
      Returns:
      The value of the discriminant (b^2 - 4ac).

    • hasRealRoots

      public boolean hasRealRoots()
      Checks if the quadratic equation has real roots.
      Returns:
      True if real roots exist, false otherwise.

    • findRealRoots

      public double[] findRealRoots()
      Finds the real roots of the quadratic equation, if they exist.
      Returns:
      An array containing the roots, or null if no real roots exist.

    • calculateDerivative

      public double calculateDerivative(double x)
      Computes the derivative of the quadratic equation at a specific value of x.
      Parameters:
      x - The value of x.
      Returns:
      The value of the derivative (2ax + b) at x.
